text: Aru khali tai aha nimite he nohoi, kintu apnikhan pora taike mon dangor kori diya te amikhan bhi anondo hoise, aru moike lok kori bole itcha pora mon bhorta thaka, kandikena mon ghurai aha, moi logote milikena modot kori bole itcha thaka, eitu khan sob khobor huni kene moi arubi bisi khushi paise.
